# This file was generated by FRUT's Jucer2CMake from "Projucer.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("Projucer")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED Projucer_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "Projucer_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(Projucer_jucer_FILE
  "${Projucer_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_VERSION "5.3.1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${Projucer_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "M70qfTRRk"
)

  PROJECT_NAME "Projucer"
  PROJECT_VERSION "5.3.1"
  COMPANY_NAME "ROLI Ltd."
  COMPANY_COPYRIGHT "ROLI Ltd."

  .         .         .         "Source/Utility/UI/jucer_JucerTreeViewBase.h"
  x         .         .         "Source/Utility/UI/jucer_ProjucerLookAndFeel.cpp"
  .         .         .         "Source/Utility/UI/jucer_ProjucerLookAndFeel.h"
  x         .         .         "Source/Utility/UI/jucer_SlidingPanelComponent.cpp"
  .         .         .         "Source/Utility/UI/jucer_SlidingPanelComponent.h"
  .         .         .         "Source/Utility/UI/jucer_UserSettingsPopup.h"
)

jucer_project_files("Projucer/Wizards"
# Compile   Xcode     Binary    File
#           Resource  Resource
  x         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_NewFileWizard.cpp"
  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_NewFileWizard.h"
  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_NewProjectWizard.h"
  x         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_NewProjectWizardClasses.cpp"
  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_NewProjectWizardClasses.h"
  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_NewProjectWizardComponent.h"
  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_ProjectWizard_Animated.h"
  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_ProjectWizard_AudioApp.h"
  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_ProjectWizard_AudioPlugin.h"
  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_ProjectWizard_Blank.h"
  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_ProjectWizard_Console.h"

  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_ProjectWizard_GUIApp.h"
  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_ProjectWizard_openGL.h"

  .         .         .         "Source/Wizards/jucer_TemplateThumbnailsComponent.h"
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_analytics
  PATH "../../modules"
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_core
  PATH "../../modules"
  # JUCE_FORCE_DEBUG
  JUCE_LOG_ASSERTIONS ON
  # JUCE_CHECK_MEMORY_LEAKS
  # JUCE_DONT_AUTOLINK_TO_WIN32_LIBRARIES
  # JUCE_INCLUDE_ZLIB_CODE
  JUCE_USE_CURL ON
  # JUCE_CATCH_UNHANDLED_EXCEPTIONS
  # JUCE_ALLOW_STATIC_NULL_VARIABLES
)

  juce_cryptography
  PATH "../../modules"
)

  juce_data_structures
  PATH "../../modules"
)

  juce_events
  PATH "../../modules"
  # JUCE_EXECUTE_APP_SUSPEND_ON_IOS_BACKGROUND_TASK
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_graphics
  PATH "../../modules"
  # JUCE_USE_COREIMAGE_LOADER
  # JUCE_USE_DIRECTWRITE
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_gui_basics
  PATH "../../modules"
  # JUCE_ENABLE_REPAINT_DEBUGGING
  # JUCE_USE_XRANDR
  # JUCE_USE_XINERAMA
  # JUCE_USE_XSHM
  # JUCE_USE_XRENDER
  # JUCE_USE_XCURSOR
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_gui_extra
  PATH "../../modules"
  # JUCE_WEB_BROWSER
  # JUCE_ENABLE_LIVE_CONSTANT_EDITOR
)

jucer_appconfig_header(
  USER_CODE_SECTION
"
/*
  ==============================================================================

   In accordance with the terms of the JUCE 5 End-Use License Agreement, the
   JUCE Code in SECTION A cannot be removed, changed or otherwise rendered
   ineffective unless you have a JUCE Indie or Pro license, or are using JUCE
   under the GPL v3 license.

   End User License Agreement: www.juce.com/juce-5-licence

  ==============================================================================
*/

// BEGIN SECTION A

#define JUCER_ENABLE_GPL_MODE 0

// END SECTION A
"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  TARGET_PROJECT_FOLDER "Builds/MacOSX" # used by HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS, EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  EXTRA_COMPILER_FLAGS
    "-Wall"
    "-Wshadow"
    "-Wno-missing-field-initializers"
    "-Wshadow"
    "-Wshorten-64-to-32"
    "-Wstrict-aliasing"
    "-Wuninitialized"
    "-Wunused-parameter"
    "-Wconversion"
    "-Wsign-compare"
    "-Wint-conversion"
    "-Wconditional-uninitialized"
    "-Woverloaded-virtual"
    "-Wreorder"
    "-Wconstant-conversion"
    "-Wsign-conversion"
    "-Wunused-private-field"
    "-Wbool-conversion"
    "-Wextra-semi"
    "-Wno-ignored-qualifiers"
    "-Wunreachable-code"
  # EXTRA_LINKER_FLAGS
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/Icons/juce_icon.png"
  DOCUMENT_FILE_EXTENSIONS
    ".jucer"
  CUSTOM_PLIST "<plist>
<dict>
	<key>NSAppTransportSecurity</key>
	<dict>
		<key>NSAllowsArbitraryLoads</key>
		<true/>
		<key>NSExceptionDomains</key>
		<dict>
			<key>amazonaws.com</key>
			<dict>
				<key>NSExceptionAllowsInsecureHTTPLoads</key>
				<true/>
				<key>NSIncludesSubdomains</key>
				<true/>
			</dict>
		</dict>
	</dict>
</dict>
</plist>"
  EXTRA_FRAMEWORKS
    "AudioUnit"
    "Accelerate"
    "AVFoundation"
    "CoreAudio"
    "CoreAudioKit"
    "CoreMIDI"
    "DiscRecording"
    "QuartzCore"
    "AudioToolbox"
    "OpenGL"
    "QTKit"
    "QuickTime"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  CXX_LIBRARY "LLVM libc++"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  CXX_LIBRARY "LLVM libc++"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Visual Studio 2013"
  TARGET_PROJECT_FOLDER "Builds/VisualStudio2013" # used by HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS, EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LINKER_FLAGS
  # EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES_TO_LINK
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/Icons/juce_icon.png"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2013"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use DLL runtime"
  DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT "Program Database (/Zi)"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2013"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use static runtime"
  DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT "None"
)

  "Visual Studio 2017"

)

  "Visual Studio 2017"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use static runtime"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2017"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  OPTIMISATION "Maximise speed"
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use static runtime"
  DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT "None"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Linux Makefile"
  TARGET_PROJECT_FOLDER "Builds/LinuxMakefile" # used by HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS, EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_COMPILER_FLAGS
  # EXTRA_LINKER_FLAGS
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/Icons/juce_icon.png"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
)

jucer_project_end()
